description:
Advanced software to recover deleted files and restore lost or damaged partitions


Active@ UNDELETE helps you to recover deleted files and restore deleted
partitions from a variety of file systems such as FAT, NTFS, NTFS + EFS, MacOS
HFS+, ApFS, Linux ext2, ext3, ext4, ZFS, Unix UFS.

Advanced scan algorithms help to restore files even from severely damaged disks.

Sophisticated user-friendly UI makes navigation through your data a breeze.
- Added eBooks signatures recovery: MOBI, AZW, AZ3, AZ4, PRC, EPUB
- Improved recovery of properties for PDF, MP3 and other signatures
- Latest recovery Kernel 15.01.17 includes many improvements and bug fixes
- The latest Linux Boot Disk based on openSUSE Leap 15.6
- Active@ Boot Disk upgraded to WinPE based on Windows 11 24H2 code base
